title: Best Deal in Fishtown/Norris Sq Beautiful Corner Unit
description:
Available NOW | Leasing Special: $1,325/month for a 18 month lease; or $1,375/month for a 12 month lease.
Beautiful corner unit! This 2 bedroom / 1 bathroom apartment welcomes you into the main living space with exposed brick, large windows for sunlight, & exposed ductwork. The kitchen area is at the back and is fully equipped with white shaker cabinets, subway tile back splash, and sleek stainless steel appliances including a microwave, dishwasher, electric range, and refrigerator. Continue to your stunning bathroom boasting a modern gray vanity and gorgeous shower stall with detailed floor-to-ceiling tiling and a glass door. On the other side of the unit you will find your 2 bedrooms with spacious closets. The corner bedroom is a bit larger and receives a ton of natural light! Unit features hardwood floors, central air, washer / dryer, and recessed lighting throughout!
About The Neighborhood:
Located in Norris Square and walkable to tons of great shopping, eating, and entertainment options. You’ll be surrounded by public transportation bus routes for a quick commute throughout the city. Close proximity to Norris Square Park, Towey Playground, and La Placita Park. Just blocks from fantastic spots including Sunflower Philly, Human Robot, Cousins Supermarket, Luna Cafe, Original 13 Ciderworks, Halftime Goodtimes, Sidekicks Sports Bar & Grill, and countless more!
Lease Terms:
Generally, first month, last month, and one month security deposit due at, or prior to, lease signing. Other terms may be required by Landlord. $55 application fee per applicant. Strictly, no pets. Tenants responsible for: electricity, cable/internet, and water. Landlord Requirements: Applicants to make a minimum of 3x the monthly rent in verifiable net income, no landlord filings or evictions within the past 4 years, and must have a verifiable rental history.

title: Completely Renovated Point Breeze Home Available for Rent
description:
Completely renovated Point Breeze Home Available for Rent. This corner property feels so spacious and bright with natural light abound through the 14 windows, a 18 feet wide lot, and 10 feet high ceilings. Enter the expansive open floor plan which includes a living, dining, and kitchen area. The finishes are fantastic with black metal railings, rich dark brown hardwood floors, recessing lighting, and modern trim and doors. In the kitchen you will find GE stainless steel appliances, two toned high gloss grey and white cabinets that further reflect the natural light, a quartz countertop with loads of space for prepping food and a coffee maker, etc.., a sculptural white backsplash tile, and an island with seating for three, one waterfall edge, a double sink and pendant lighting. The first floor also has a convenient half bath and coat closet as well. On the second floor, you will find the primary suite in the rear with a full bathroom, walk in closet, and it's own private deck to enjoy your coffee, enjoy a roof garden, or relax and read a book. The primary bath has a stall shower with a detachable sprayer, lovely large tile work, and double sinks. There are also two other bedrooms with good sized closets and another full bath with a tub. Walk up another flight to a pilot house and enter the large roof deck to entertain friends and family and enjoy vistas of city center. The finished basement can be used as a a game room, office, or workout space. It also has a separate storage area and the mechanical closet too. Enjoy this fantastic location near Wharton Square Park, wonderful coffee shops like Ultimo, or walk to the Sardine Bar, Philly Tacos, and Community for a bite to eat. Also, just a 20 minute walk to Rittenhouse or a quick hop on 476 for easy commuting too. Owner looking for a December 1st start date on the lease and open to a longer term lease (ie a 14 or 16 month lease.)

title: Welcome to this beautiful and spacious 1 bedroom 1 bathroom condo
